# defaultMode

**Type Property**

Run loop mode that should be used when a thread is in its default, or idle, state, waiting for an event. This mode is used when the run loop is started with [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopRun()].

## Declaration

```swift
static let defaultMode: CFRunLoopMode!
```
title: defaultMode
